deck_consistency.global_rule: Consistent 16:9 layout. Primary content always within safe area (90%).
deck_consistency.anchor_motif: Top-left geometric marker or consistent header alignment

styles_v2.image_prompt_one_line: hand-drawn doodle style, blue ink on lined paper, notebook sketch aesthetic, raw and authentic, creative brainstorming visuals, white paper texture background, high quality scan
styles_v2.negative_prompt: digital, vector art, 3d render, glossy, shiny, perfect lines, typography overlay

styles_v2.image_prompt_one_line: bauhaus style, geometric shapes, primary colors, minimalist composition, matte texture, abstract design, architectural influence, clean lines
styles_v2.negative_prompt: organic shapes, messy, grunge, watercolor, realistic photo, complex details

styles_v2.image_prompt_one_line: cyberpunk city street at night, neon rain, reflection on wet pavement, futuristic ui elements overlay, dark blue and purple atmosphere, glowing cyan accents, cinematic lighting
styles_v2.negative_prompt: daylight, sun, nature, wood, paper, flat design, white background, low contrast
noise, grunge, dark background, complex pattern, 3d render artifacts, text, watermark
